short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides the main start page in Google Chrome, allowing you to search through Google or DuckDuckGo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Overrides the main start page in Google Chrome, allowing you to search through Google or DuckDuckGo. It's an alternative to the original start page and will override the New Tab page and when you launch the browser.
